column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Barbara - Thank you so much for the great review. I'm happy to hear you gave us a try and happier that you liked it! When we decided to open shop in Houston almost two years ago
column2: we weren't sure how the locals would take to high-end Japanese ramen. But with feedback like yours
column3: I'm beyond happy to know we have been embraced by my hometown. Thank you again
column4: and we hope to serve you again soon!
